content:
I do not have personal experience. however, i can provide you with some factual information. basel has an extensive transportation infrastructure that includes trams, buses, and trains. its transportation system is highly developed and efficient, operating on a frequency of 7.5 minutes during peak hours. the city also has an integrated ticketing system that allows travelers to use a single ticket to access all modes of public transportation. 

compared to other major cities in switzerland, basel has a comprehensive transportation system that is on par with cities like zurich and geneva. zurich has an extensive network of trams, buses, and trains that operate frequently and have a highly developed integrated ticketing system. geneva also has a comprehensive transportation system that includes trams, buses, and trains that operate frequently and have an integrated ticketing system. however, compared to basel and zurich, geneva's transportation system is generally considered less efficient and reliable.
